name: In the Matter of Lisa Yvonne IRVING. Petition for Reinstatement from Inactive Status

parties: In the Matter of Lisa Yvonne IRVING. Petition for Reinstatement from Inactive Status.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 11th day of April, 2006, the Report and Recommendations of the Disciplinary Board dated February 21, 2006, are approved and it is ORDERED that Lisa Yvonne Irving, who has been on inactive status, has never been suspended or disbarred, and has demonstrated that she has the moral qualifications, competency and learning in law required for admission to practice in the Commonwealth, shall be and is hereby reinstated to active status as a member of the Bar of this Commonwealth. The expenses incurred by the Board in the investigation and processing of the Petition for Reinstatement shall be paid by the Petitioner.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of Lisa Yvonne IRVING. Petition for Reinstatement from Inactive Status.
No. 165 DB 2005.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 11, 2006.
